channel.title: Emo's vs chavs
channel.description:
ok im going to just summarise to groups here, u gotta pick which one you most are... and if u dont know :
emo's: listen to rock .. bla bla bla u get me. chav's: listen to r&b and hip hop.....
im definatly emo
by the way in a magazine or somewhere i read that more gothic people grow up to be very sucsessfull and lead better lives. sorry if i start a flame war here but go ahead...

item.title: Emo's vs chavs
item.dc:creator: @Uxalis Uxalis
item.description:
@Uxalis wrote:

Goths are better than emo!

Goods About Goths:

Black Clothing - Some is soo good.
Gothic Signers - Tend to be hotter
Better Music - Much more meaningful than chavs good ol’ "Uh, Uh, Oh, Yeh, Give it to me baby, Uh, Uh, Yeh"every song about sex.
Goods about emo’s:

Converse - Geta wear em
Listen to kick-ass music.

And im outta here.

Read full topic

item.title: Emo's vs chavs
item.dc:creator: @BlackThursday BlackThursday
item.description:
@BlackThursday wrote:

[quote=“mushr00m, post:101, topic:3987”][quote author=Aftermath_96 link=topic=4986.msg51331#msg51331 date=1150825400]
Council Housed And Violent
[/quote]

im sorry but that takes the piss.
i am 16 years old, going on 17 in 3 months.
i have been 85% chav since i was about 12 years old, but i have NEVER worn burberry, i have NEVER stood outside a McDonalds restaurant looking for a fight with adults or kids. i don’t now and have never lived in a council house, in fact i must say i live in quite a nice house, not to be big-headed or anything. i have also NEVER had a fight that would qualify as ‘violent’ - it was more of a punch to the face , ironically an ‘emo’ kid’s face, because i constantly had his mouth in my ear saying, ‘you’re gay, what kind of music is THAT, what the fuck you looking at’ etc. etc. And as you should be able to tell, i can talk and spell properly. I listen to music like rap, r&b, hip hop, but mainly drum and bass, as i am about to be a relatively succesful DJ in this music. So for all you emo/goth twats out there that constanly moan ‘chavs are scum, dont feed the chavs’, i suggest you get a life instead of listening to music that makes you feel even more depressed than you are already are.

OWNED[/quote]

Read full topic
